data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 23,539 believers living in the state of Liguria. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Liguria, Italy
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Liguria with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary: On average, 154 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Liguria, Italy.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 23,539 believers in Liguria, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Liguria, Italy.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Somali people.
There are 1,616,000 people living in the state of Liguria. Only about 23,539 might be believers.
Over 18.67 percent of the people of Liguria are far from Jesus.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Liguria.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.
